features: ADVANCED GLASS-LIKE SURFACE: An even smoother surface with more clarity.
SELF-HEALING TECHNOLOGY: Heals minor scratches and dings.
EASY APPLICATION: The EZ Apply install method makes applying your Ultra Clear simple and accurate.
Lifetime : If your InvisibleShield ever gets worn or damaged, we will replace it for as long as you own your device.
body.description: Proprietary Ion Matrix technology strengthens at the molecular level and preserves the smooth look and feel of Glass+. A precision surfacing process ensures maximum scratch resistance. The premium composition of this smooth tempered glass ensures that all of your images are sharp and vibrant. The remarkable touch sensitivity of Glass+ responds to every tap and swipe. The reinforced edges of Glass+ help prevent chipping, and their beveled shape seems to disappear into the screen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZAGG InvisibleShield Ultra Clear Plus - Film Screen Protector Introducing Ultra Clear+: the incredibly clear and unbelievably tough screen protection. A glass-like film that will protect your Samsung device.

Protect your screen from impact and scratches! This incredibly tough protection has 100% clarity. The glass-like surface of Ultra Clear+ preserves the sharp, vibrant optics of the most advanced smartphone displays. Ultra Clear+ fits flat or curved screens, and it preserves your screen’s touch sensitivity, so it responds to every tap and swipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product with the best install system I've used
reviews.reviewText: The best thing about this product is that it has a very well-thought-out installation system. The packaging doubles as an alignment jig, and there are 4 layers that peel off in sequence to make sure there is exact alignment with zero dust. I was very impressed, because other protectors I've used in the past didn't provide much help getting the thing properly aligned, and it always seemed no matter how careful there would be that one tiny little dust bubble.This one installed perfectly the first time. It doesn't interfere with the finger sensor, and feels smooth to the touch.My only slight negative I've noticed is that I can feel the edge, which I use as the "back" swipe gesture (swiping in from the edge) I didn't experience that with my old protector, so I think it's very very slightly undersized compared to my old one. It's not a big deal and doesn't interfere with touch and gestures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy at your own risk *updated *
reviews.reviewText: First of all I want to say this review is not final, I will update when I hear back from invisible shield which I hope is soon.After opening the package I noticed some lines in the middle of the screen protector but dismissed them when I realized that the way this is applied is top half first and bottom half second so that the hard plastic that comes off is in two pieces. I figured the lines would come off after installation, they didn't. As you can see by the pictures they are still there. I don't think this happened during shipment because it's boxed in a plastic cover from the merchant. I think this is a direct result of the way this is packaged! The other issue is also as you can see it doesn't cover the entire screen on the ultra. I've emailed invisi shield I. Hopes of either getting my money back or getting a new screen protector. At this time I can't say wether I recommend this product or not, it will depend on response from the company!*update*I said I would update when I heard from the company. They finally reached out to me and sent me a replacement. As you know this screen protector comes with a warranty, which is awesome! They sent me a replacement and all is good now, I would definitely buy this product again. This screen protector is the best I've ever used, I do recommend to watch the video of how to install, there's some on YouTube. The directions on paper can get confusing so the video will help clear the confusion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible Directions/Defective Product
reviews.reviewText: I followed the directions provided in the box but the screen protector did not peel or stick as stated. For the price, this item should be much more user firendly! They need to re-evaluate their packaging and instruction manual. Like maybe do a test study asking 10 random volunteers to try to install this product themselves, WITHOUT ANYONES HELP--JUST THE INSTRUCTIONS IT COMES WITH, so they can WATCH CAREFULLY and see what's happening.ATTENTION OWNERS/MANUFACTURERS: READ THE REVIEWS FOR YOUR PRODUCT! SOMETHING IS OFF: EITHER YOUR INSTRUCTIONS ARE MISSING A STEP/S OR YOUR PRODUCT IS DEFECTIVE.I should have listened to the other reviews.Will NOT buy again!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: the screen protector works perfectly, bought once and installed kinda funky because i didn't quite understand what the instructions were saying until after i was done. i bought a second time after trying a couple others, and i like how nicely it fits the screen, it feels almost like glass. my only complaint is that over a period of a couple months, with my phone being in my pocket, my screen protector actually migrated up the screen so the bottom 3/16" is no longer covered and the screen protector now covers the camera and part of the case. its stuck on my screen enough that i cant slide it manually at all, but slowly but surely it still keeps moving little by little. I'm hesitant to buy another because of this, but its honestly one of the best i tried so far in terms of fit, feel, and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a great product, installation is super easy and Zagg has videos on YouTube for every phone they support explaining how to use the installation tray properly.Only con I would say is that, like every protector, it does move some over time but if you just use your fingers to push the opposite way repeatedly, it will move back into place.Zagg also offers a great warranty after you register on their site and will replace your protector even if it's your fault its messed up.Cant go wrong with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars ZAGG InvisibleShield Ultra Clear Plus - Installation is a little tricky.
reviews.reviewText: The directions state to start in the center with the squeegee to start the release of the bottom protective layer. You really need to start past the center and bend the layers back far enough to allow the bottom protective layer to flip out and tart peeling forward. I also made the mistake of rubbing at a bubble with my fingernail that left some indents that I don't think are going to come out. They don't seem to affect the affect the clarity of the screen, but they don't look nice in reflected light. The bottom protective layers are adhesive to remove any dust stragglers during the installation.On the plus side the adhesion seems strong even around the edges. I didn't have to re-register my fingerprints to unlock the phone. Zagg was quick to send me a replacement when I totally boogered up the 1st one I got from Amazon, although it cost me about $8.00 shipping.Will I buy another one in the future? Probably. Will I be more careful with the installation? Definitely.
Product is easy to install and works as it should

El material del protector es bueno.Para ser una película plástica tipo "plástico cristal", me gusto mucho la sensación del protector, casi como el cristal. La claridad es adecuada.Viene con lo necesario para instalar pero...Las instrucciones de instalación no son muy claras y/o no lo supe instalar adecuadamente. Logré corregir y quedó suficientemente bien instalado.Recomiendo el protector pero también Recomiendo leer varias veces las instrucciones y ver videos de instalación.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It tore very easily on the screen when I dropped it at home.It was very difficult to apply because it's too long and the sides kept peeling. I kept smoothing it down but every time I got it out of the case or put it in a holder it would peel a little bit.
Works as intended. If you have trouble installing, then it must be you. There was a line across the screen, horizontally, but disappeared a few days later. Will buy again. Watch the install video.
